body.p: The Changes view displays all the files that have been changed in the workspace.
You can click on a file to see a comparison (diff) of the changes. The version on the left shows the current workspace version while the version on the right shows the current project version.

A contextual menu can be invoked by clicking the 3 vertical dots (ellipsis) next to a particular file when hovering over it and the following actions are available:
Open file - Opens the latest editable workspace version of the file in the editor.
Discard changes - Discards any changes you have made to the file in the workspace.
Discard all changes - Discards all changes you have made in the entire workspace.

section.title: Create New Review Task Based on Your Workspace Changes
section.p: After making changes in your personal workspace, you can create a new review task that contains your changes. You can then share the task with others so that they review your changes before you integrate them back into the project.

To create a review task based on your changes, click the New Review Task button at the bottom of the Changes view. In the resulting page, you can give the review task a title, set a Due date, and select a Context publication from the list of defined publications for the project. The changed files that are automatically attached to the review task are listed in the Files to review box. Click Create when you are finished configuring the new review task. You can then share the task with Reviewers.
